name: The Man In Pumpkin
description:
The Man in Pumpkin

Hello! I am Alfredo Villegas also known as "The Purple Leaf" and I am a beginner game developer. The Man in Pumpkin is a story of a warrior from another world that stumbles upon a peaceful world where it is corrupted by goblins. 

Game Engine: Unity

Assets, sprites, animation maker: Aseprite

This game is developed as participation to the Mini Jam89 event.
